channel.title: Mathematics Projects on Yi Yao Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematics Projects on Yi Yao Tan

item.title: Random Generation of Catalan Counted Simulations
item.description: Created a library for the simulation of random uniform generation of combinatorial structures counted by Catalan Numbers using natural bijections between different combinatorial objects in Mathematica and Python. Project Repository

item.title: Trinomial Tree Model for Option Pricing
item.description: Studied the trinomial tree for options pricing of a martingale using backward induction. Responsible for numerical analysis and simulations. Project Repository Preprint
